price: Allah - es gibt keinen Gott außer Ihm. Sein sind die schönsten Namen.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ لَهُ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa lahu al-asmāu al-ḥus'nā
